entry.title: Open Access Journal: Egyptian Museum Newsletter
entry.content:
[Originally posted 3/1/10. Updated 5/21/10. Updated 7/7/10]

As of today, the Egyptian Museum Newsletter is officially hosted by the EEF:



Egyptian Museum Newsletter
    • Egyptian Museum Newsletter no. 7 (January-April 2010), English version (PDF-file, 1.77 MB)
    • Egyptian Museum Newsletter no. 7 (January-April 2010), Arabic version (PDF-file, 1.79 MB)
    • Egyptian Museum Newsletter no. 6 (September-December 2009), English version (PDF-file, 1.09 MB)
    • Egyptian Museum Newsletter no. 6 (September-December 2009), Arabic version (PDF-file, 1.09 MB)
    • Egyptian Museum Newsletter no. 5 (May-August 2009), English and Arabic version (PDF-file, 3.54 MB) [not available at the moment]
    • Egyptian Museum Newsletter no. 4 (January-April 2009), English and Arabic version (PDF-file) [not available at the moment]
    • Egyptian Museum Newsletter no. 3 (September-December 2008), English version (PDF-file, 740 kB)
    • Egyptian Museum Newsletter no. 2 (May-August 2008), English version (PDF-file, 1.64 MB)
    • Egyptian Museum Newsletter no. 1 (January-April 2008), English version (PDF-file, 913 kB)

    Earlier archives may remain active as follows:


    [Posted 5/21/10] I have found a more complete set of the Egyptian Museum Newsletter

    Egyptian Museum Newsletter

    You can view a copy of the first issue of the Egyptian Museum newsletter in PDF format by clicking here.
    You can view a copy of the second issue of the Egyptian Museum newsletter in PDF format by clicking here.

    You can view a copy of the third issue in PDF format by clicking here,

    You can view a copy of the fourth issue in PDF format by clicking here.

    You can view a copy of the fifth issue in PDF format by clicking here

    Issue six in PDF format in English is here, and in Arabic here.

    See the full List of Open Access Journals in Ancient Studies.
